name: The Sound of Gravity
description:
Time your movement to the sound, as it can turn gravity on or off. Only your momentum will carry you without gravity, so think ahead.

This game was made for the  79th Trijam. It was made in 3 hours to fit the theme of Anti-Gravity, as well as the bonus-theme of  having sound and music impact the gameplay.

Controls:

WASD -> Move (Only when gravity is on)

Space -> Jump (Only when gravity is on)

WASD + Shift -> Dash (Only when gravity is off)
